vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.15.30;
son of: Elah (H0425I)
§ Hosea or Hoshea or Oshea = "salvation"
1) family name of Joshua, the son of Nun
2) the 19th and last king of the northern kingdom of Israel
3) son of Beeri, and the first of the minor prophets; prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel in the reign of Jeroboam II
4) a son of Azaziah, a chief of Ephraim in the time of David
5) an Israelite chief who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יֵשׁוּע ,יְהוֹשׁוּע   hijo de Nun; espía; tribu de Efraín; (b)   hijo de Elá; rey de Israel (732/31-723/22); (c)   hijo de Azazías; jefe; tribu de Efraín; en tiempos de David; (e)   hombre; post exílico; (f)   hijo de Beerí; profeta
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
何西阿 或 何細亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "拯救"
1) 約書亞的本名, 嫩的兒子 ( #民 13:16| )
2) 北國以色列的第十九個王, 是以色列國的最後一個王. ( #王下 17:6| )
3) 備利的兒子, 第一個小先知; 當耶羅波安二世在位時於北國以色列作先知. ( #何 1:1| )
4) 阿撒細雅的兒子, 於大衛王時作以法蓮人的首領. ( #代上 27:20| )
5) 一位以色列的首領, 與尼希米立約 ( #尼 10:11| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
何西阿 或 何细亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "拯救"
1) 约书亚的本名, 嫩的儿子 ( #民 13:16| )
2) 北国以色列的第十九个王, 是以色列国的最后一个王. ( #王下 17:6| )
3) 备利的儿子, 第一个小先知; 当耶罗波安二世在位时于北国以色列作先知. ( #何 1:1| )
4) 阿撒细雅的儿子, 于大卫王时作以法莲人的首领. ( #代上 27:20| )
5) 一位以色列的首领, 与尼希米立约 ( #尼 10:11| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.20;
son of: Azaziah (H5812H)
§ Hosea or Hoshea or Oshea = "salvation"
1) family name of Joshua, the son of Nun
2) the 19th and last king of the northern kingdom of Israel
3) son of Beeri, and the first of the minor prophets; prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel in the reign of Jeroboam II
4) a son of Azaziah, a chief of Ephraim in the time of David
5) an Israelite chief who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.23
§ Hosea or Hoshea or Oshea = "salvation"
1) family name of Joshua, the son of Nun
2) the 19th and last king of the northern kingdom of Israel
3) son of Beeri, and the first of the minor prophets; prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel in the reign of Jeroboam II
4) a son of Azaziah, a chief of Ephraim in the time of David
5) an Israelite chief who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Hos.1.1;
son of: Beeri (H0882H); married to Gomer (H1586H);
father of: Jezreel (H3157K), Lo-ruhamah (H3819), Lo-ammi H3818)
Also named: Hōsēe<\i> (Ὡσηέ "Hosea" G5617)
§ Hosea or Hoshea or Oshea = "salvation"
1) family name of Joshua, the son of Nun
2) the 19th and last king of the northern kingdom of Israel
3) son of Beeri, and the first of the minor prophets; prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel in the reign of Jeroboam II
4) a son of Azaziah, a chief of Ephraim in the time of David
5) an Israelite chief who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness & Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Exo.17.9;
son of: Nun (H5126); also called Hoshea (KJV: Oshea) at Num.13.8; Jeshua at Neh.8.17;
Another name of ye.ho.shu.a (יְהוֹשׁוּעַ "Joshua" H3091)
§ Hosea or Hoshea or Oshea = "salvation"
1) family name of Joshua, the son of Nun
2) the 19th and last king of the northern kingdom of Israel
3) son of Beeri, and the first of the minor prophets; prophet to the northern kingdom of Israel in the reign of Jeroboam II
4) a son of Azaziah, a chief of Ephraim in the time of David
5) an Israelite chief who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
